heading: ingenie Business
body: This app was built when 'ingenie Business' required a B2B site for marketing their core telematics technology that powered ingenie Insurance product it offered to its own customer. The App was built in the latest Angular version at the time and used a NodeJS backend using Nodemailer to handle mail requests and responses. Both apps were built, linted and unit tested through CircleCI before being deployed to Azure Cloud hosting.

heading: Home Tutoring - Custom Theme
body: Key Stage 1 & 2 Home tutoring site for a local business start-up.

heading: Sheilas' Wheels Loyalty
body: Sheilas Wheels first native app built using the ionic framework and headless CMS. Marketing could then update current discounts and incentives as well as offer add-on products and services. Drupal was used as a headless CMS for marketing to manage with as little developer input as possible. The app was deployed on both AppStore and Google Play during a phase where esure were going through a digital transformation.

heading: Stranger Things Quiz/Game
body: Using Angular 13 this Quiz was created to test family and friends on their 'Stranger Things' knowledge. Feel free to give it a spin if you think your a super fan. Includes a 'whack a demogorgon' game.

heading: Garden Landscaping - Custom Theme
body: Our friends at Bud Landscapes wanted their site refreshed so this is the finished product. They wanted a site that would show off their garden projects and using video and photos. They do some great garden cabins if your in the market for one.

heading: Howden Driving Data
body: Howden Driving Data is a leading data company, specialising in the use of behavioral and geospatial data to provide insurers, brokers, financial institutions, and OEMs with loss prevention and loss management solutions across the globe. This was a quick turnaround custom theme for Howden and ingenie after the takeover.

heading: BT Roofing Limited
body: Roofing Specialists - Reigate company. We are Roofing Specialists in Reigate and Banstead and surrounding areas. Website setup, hosting and emails. Ongoing SEO work being carried out

heading: ingenie custom rebuild and libraries
body: Complete rebuild of the ingenie brochure ware site in WordPress. Custom themed from scratch and integrated style/component library. Continuous delivery was set up using CircleCI and deployed to their existing managed WordPress hosting platform. The component library helped non-tech people within marketing manage content and add complex blocks of functionality with ease, whilst keeping component elements uniform throughout the site.

heading: Flashlight Photography
body: Flashlight Photography provide modern and traditional school / nursery photography for schools. Simple intergrated ordering system for photos.

heading: esure My Account
body: Part of team involved in the digital transformation to allow customer to access their insurance products details online and self manage. Involved in coding and testing of various parts of the app from login & authentication to dash widgets displays. The 'My Account' product was built for both Sheilas' Wheels and esure customers who could have home or motor insurance products with us. I was heavily involved in the design process as well as development.

heading: esure FNOL App
body: I was tasked with building this native hybrid app by a sponsor while working for the esure Group. After the success of the Sheilas' Wheels app and release, esure wanted to investigate opportunities around savings with 'First Notice of Loss' app. This was built using the ionic framework and had features such as capture images/details at the scene, with the ability to send to esure and store your insurance details to share with other driver involved.

heading: Mower Spares - E-Commerce
body: Spare parts for Lawnmowers and garden machinery - all the spares for lawnmowers you will ever need with an unbeatable service. Shopping cart and payment setup for client in Maidenhead.

heading: Legacy - Widesign Site
body: Legacy design for web design company.
